Title: Enemies At Our Door
Description:
The Zandalari have begun their attack! You must help defend the village!

If we can't push them back, we will never find the Thunder King's remains!
ObjectivesText: Defeat 10 Amani Beserkers, 5 Amani Behemoths, and 3 Gurubashi Bloodriders.
RewardText:
The Zandalari have started to retreat, $n. This victory will mean a great deal to the villagers.

In the chaos I was able to capture one of the fighters. Perhaps we can get information from him.
